dialogue.name: Yvyteph Sharp Intro Root
lines: Touch me at your peril, mortal. I know I am irresistable, but try to control yourself. I am the crystal Sharpness in Yvyteph's Wildness.

dialogue.name: Maya Is Confusion
lines: Hi! No touch, no problem. I always ask first.

dialogue.name: Maya Weariness
lines: Yvyteph's wild form seemed pretty sharp; did she really need to be more dangerous?

dialogue.name: Yvyteph Sharp Reply
thoughts: My sister aspects are too soft. That is why you still live, I'd wager.

dialogue.name: Yvyteph Wild Danger Advice
lines: Why do you hesitate in destroying your foe? Burn his soul and then burn him!

dialogue.name: Maya Stranger Danger
lines: Yep, I know. Burn and kill and so forth. Gotcha.

choices.text: How can I kill the big tree guy?

dialogue.name: Maya Curious
lines: So if I did want to kill the tree fella before he kills me, how would I do that?

dialogue.name: Yvyteph Wild Sharp Passions
lines: Wood tends not to enjoy the touch of flame. Find the heart of fire in this world and see it Consume him. All of him.
See how he weeps? Seize upon that target!
thoughts: I want him consumed body AND soul, or you'll bore me.

choices.text: How can I kill the tree golems?

dialogue.name: Yvyteph Wild Sharp Passions
lines: Wood tends not to enjoy the touch of flame. These creatures are simplistic; merely burn their center mass and move on.
Try not to let their boulders launch you out of the world! And don't be surprised if they bring their own fire to the table if you get too close.
thoughts: I love the sound of their breath weapon!

choices.text: How can I kill the robot ladies?

dialogue.name: Yvyteph Wild Sharp Passions
lines: Ah, those creatures are fascinating; rocks that humans taught to think! Such a spectacle.
They have electricity for blood -- perhaps disrupting that flow would be useful?
thoughts: I wish I still had the manual. There were *diagrams*!
